item.title: UK economy stalls in July, as slowdown sets in
item.description: Economists expect a slowdown to take hold of the U.K. in the latter half of 2025.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent met this week with Warsh, Lindsey and Bullard as Fed chief search continues
item.description: The search for the next Federal Reserve chair is continuing, with Bessent taking point in meeting with several candidates.

item.title: Trump's tariffs are slowly finding their way into consumer prices
item.description: A key Bureau of Labor Statistics inflation report showed price increases for a variety of tariff-sensitive items.

item.title: Consumer prices rose at annual rate of 2.9% in August, as weekly jobless claims jump
item.description: The consumer price index was expected to increase 0.3% in August, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

item.title: European Central Bank leaves rates unchanged as tariff fallout lingers
item.description: The ECB is grappling with global economic uncertainty, despite inflation in the euro zone hovering around the central bank's 2% target in recent month...
